# UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode.minimal

**Case**

The navigation item displays the Back button indicator instead of a title.

## Declaration

```swift
case minimal
```

## Discussion

When you set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/backButtonDisplayMode-swift.property] property to this value, the Back button doesn’t display a title. Instead, it displays the Back button indicator image.

## Constants

- **UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode.default**: The navigation item attempts to display a specific title, a generic title, or no title for the Back button, depending on the space available.
- **UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode.generic**: The navigation item attempts to display a generic title or no title for the Back button, depending on the space available.
